content:
Freshman open option student Wes Friednash fills up his reusable water bottle at the Farrand Hall triple filtered water filling station on Thursday PERIOD The water station and others like it started as student proposals which were then funded by the Sustainable CU grants program PERIOD CU IndependentRobert R PERIOD Denton

Rob is a senior newseditorial major at the University of Colorado  Boulder in the School of Journalism and Mass Communication and is a managing editor for the CU Independent PERIOD He has previously worked with Rich Clarkson  Associates a multimedia firm in Denver The Greeley Tribune PBS NewsHours InaugBlog and the Scripps Howard Foundation Wire PERIOD While not taking photos for the CUI Rob enjoys taking photos of just about everything else being joyful and watching The Dark Knight PERIOD Follow him on Twitter at robertrdenton PERIOD
